title: NBA Draft Reactions With Bill Simmons, Raja Bell, and Kevin O'Connor
description:
Russillo is joined by Bill Simmons, Raja Bell, and Kevin O'Connor to react to Round 1 of the 2020 NBA draft. They talk prospects, trades, the telecast, and more.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
